entities.description: Use of prescription tranquilizers causing long-lasting or repeated emotional or mental health problems.
Important activities potentially affected by tranquilizer use, such as spending time with friends and family, attending events, participating in hobbies and sports, and attending religious services.

Serious problems at work, school, or home caused by tranquilizer use, including missing work or school, getting demoted, not being able to keep a job, getting suspended or expelled, or failing to take care of family.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has used prescription tranquilizers.
Links tranquilizer use with the negative impact on important activities.
Links tranquilizer use with serious problems at work, school, or home.
